OOC:Ok...really i was just trying to start another pointless fight 
over nothing...j/k

BIC:
::FireBlade::
FireBlade could finally feel his legs again. Smething had changed on 
this planet from his own he thought. There he could completely 
destroy other enemies....here however...was more of a challenge. I 
must get some upgrades he thought to himself...when the time comes.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> I didn't mean to imply that he's small, just smaller than Autofire.
> Autofire is a bit over 16 feet.
> 
> ::Autofire/Incarcinator::
> 
> Autofire doesn't acknowledge as another shell nearly hits him, and 
he
> fires back again. He scans upwards, seeing Incarcinator dodging the
> first wave (previous post) of firepower and detonating the missiles,
> but Autofire's second wave got him, sending him flipping through 
the air.
> 
> Autofire continues on course toward the Decepticon base.
> 
> 
>
